mapper.select: SELECT browse_history.id,seek.id AS ids,seek_type,miss_name,gender,birthdate,miss_date,seek_status,miss_detail_place,GROUP_CONCAT(seek_img.url SEPARATOR ',') AS seekimgs,last_browse_time FROM browse_history LEFT JOIN seek ON seek.id=browse_history.seek_id LEFT JOIN seek_img ON seek.id=seek_img.seek_id WHERE browse_history.customer_id=#{customerId} GROUP BY browse_history.id,seek.id,miss_name,gender,birthdate,miss_date,miss_detail_place,last_browse_time ORDER BY last_browse_time desc LIMIT ${(currentPageNo-1)*pageSize},${pageSize}
select id from browse_history where seek_id=#{seekId} and customer_id=#{customerId};
mapper.update: update browse_history set last_browse_time=NOW() where id=#{id};
